metadata.name: DNS Query for Anonfiles.com Domain - DNS Client
metadata.comment: Detects DNS queries for anonfiles.com, which is an anonymous file upload platform often used for malicious purposes

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM dns_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND metadata.event_code = 3008 AND contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('.anonfiles.com')))

output.summary: Detects DNS queries for anonfiles.com, which is an anonymous file upload platform often used for malicious purposes

metadata.objective: False positive: Rare legitimate access to anonfiles.com Reference: https://www.trendmicro.com/vinfo/us/security/news/ransomware-spotlight/ransomware-spotlight-blackbyte
